episodes.title: The Kenyan Preacher who Led Hundreds to their Deaths | The Shakahola Cult
episodes.description:
This video covers the Shakahola Forest tragedy and the rise of Paul Mackenzie, the preacher behind Kenya’s most notorious doomsday cult. In this true crime documentary, we explore how Mackenzie, founder of Good News International Ministries, convinced hundreds of followers to abandon their lives and move into an isolated forest settlement, leading to one of the deadliest cult incidents in modern history.

We dive into Mackenzie’s early life, his radical preaching, and the terrifying beliefs that pushed his followers toward extreme isolation in the name of salvation. Learn how fear, manipulation, and promises of spiritual purity spiraled into a national tragedy that left hundreds dead and many more missing.

This in-depth look at the Shakahola cult is a chilling reminder of how dangerous charismatic leaders can become when unchecked.

episodes.title: The Radical Cult Who Awaited Doomsday in a Cave │The Penza Recluses
episodes.description:
The Penza Recluses were members of a fanatical cult that set up their own church in the 2000's called the True Russian Orthodox church in a small Russian Village. This short documentary follows the story of it's founder Pyotr Kuznetsov who convinced his followers that doomsday was fast approaching and they needed to await the end of times out in a cave to survive. Kuznetsov and his cult disavowed all technology, processed foods and communication with anyone outside of the group. The actions of Pyotr and his followers led to tragic outcomes for some but even after that, some of his followers remained faithful to their radical beliefs.

episodes.title: North Shields Death Cult │ Zahid Zaman
episodes.description:
This video is about the chilling crime against Jimmy Prout, a 45-year-old man from North Shields who was subjected to a campaign of abuse over months and ultimately killed by a group of individuals who were part of a cult-like group.This case raises the question: Was this a cult? In this video, we will explore the formation of the group, the dynamics of the cult, and the heinous acts committed against Jimmy Prout. 

We will examine the manipulation that led to Jimmy's tragic demise, the role of the group's leader, Zahid Zaman, 43, and the involvement of other members, including Ann Corbett, 26, Myra Wood, 45, and Kay Rayworth, 56.We will also discuss the missed opportunities to save Jimmy Prout and the trial that followed, which saw Zaman and Corbett convicted of murder, while Rayworth and Wood were convicted of causing or allowing the death of a vulnerable adult.So, was this a cult?
